column1:
W
e  heard  the  learned  Counsel  for  the  Respondent-Appellant-Petitioners  in  support  of
this  Application.  Having  scrutinized  the  petition,  affidavit,  documents,  the  impugned
Order  of  the  Wakf  Tribunal  dated  10-12-2022  and  the  oral  submission  of  the  learned
Counsel for the Respondent-Appellant-Petitioners, it is the view of this Court that this is
a fit and proper case to grant leave to appeal, and therefore the leave to appeal as prayed
for in prayer (a) of the petition dated 20-12-2020 is granted.
